name: thoughtmcp
description: AI that thinks more like humans do - MCP server with human-like cognitive architecture for enhanced reasoning, memory, and self-monitoring

scripts.dev:docker: npm run docker:up:dev && npm run dev
scripts.docker:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down
scripts.docker:down:volumes: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v
scripts.prebuild: npm run format && npm run validate && npm run clean
scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:bundle
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run ui:build
scripts.build:quick: npm run clean && npm run build:types && npm run build:bundle
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf ui/dist ui/node_modules/.vite
scripts.audit:check: npm audit --audit-level=moderate --omit=dev || (echo '‚ùå Security vulnerabilities found. Run: npm audit fix' && exit 1)
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run ui:test
scripts.test:qa: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage:all: npm run test:coverage && npm run ui:test:coverage
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run ui:lint
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix && npm run ui:lint:fix
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run ui:format
scripts.format:check:all: npm run format:check && npm run ui:format:check
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run ui:typecheck
scripts.check:any: ! grep -r --include='*.ts' -E ': any|as any|any\[\]|<any>' src/ --exclude-dir=__tests__ || echo 'No forbidden any types found'
scripts.check:debug: ! grep -r --include='*.ts' -E 'console\.(log|debug|info)|debugger' src/ --exclude-dir=__tests__ --exclude-dir=server --exclude='logger.ts' --exclude='MonitoringDashboard.ts' --exclude='PerformanceMonitor.ts' --exclude='config.ts' --exclude='version.ts' || echo 'No debug statements found'
scripts.validate: npm run audit:check && npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run validate:git && npm run test:unit
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate && npm run ui:format:check && npm run ui:lint && npm run ui:typecheck && npm run ui:test
scripts.validate:ci: npm run audit:check && npm run format:check && npm run lint:strict && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:all && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml --profile ui up -d --build --wait
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate:ci && npm run build
